INSERT INTO review ( review_seq, rsv_seq, user_id, review_title, review_content, rating, review_stat, reg_dt, update_dt ) VALUES ( #{reviewSeq}, #{rsvSeq}, #{userId}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{rating}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_SEQ AS REVIEW_SEQ, R.REVIEW_TITLE AS REVIEW_TITLE, R.RATING AS RATING, R.REG_DT AS REG_DT, RM.ROOM_TITLE AS ROOM_TITLE, RT.ROOM_TYPE_TITLE AS ROOM_TYPE_TITLE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN RESERVATION RS ON R.RSV_SEQ = RS.RSV_SEQ INNER JOIN ROOM_TYPE RT ON RS.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ = RT.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ INNER JOIN ROOM RM ON RT.ROOM_SEQ = RM.ROOM_SEQ WHERE R.USER_ID = #{userId} AND R.REVIEW_STAT = 'Y' ORDER BY R.REVIEW_SEQ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_STAT = 'N', UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE REVIEW_SEQ = #{reviewSeq} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_TITLE = #{reviewTitle}, REVIEW_CONTENT = #{reviewContent}, RATING = #{rating}, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE REVIEW_SEQ = #{reviewSeq} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_SEQ AS REVIEW_SEQ, R.REVIEW_TITLE AS REVIEW_TITLE, R.RATING AS RATING, U.NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME, R.REG_DT AS REG_DT FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN RESERVATION RS ON R.RSV_SEQ = RS.RSV_SEQ INNER JOIN ROOM_TYPE RT ON RS.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ = RT.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ INNER JOIN SB_USER U ON R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE RT.ROOM_SEQ = #{roomSeq} AND R.REVIEW_STAT = 'Y' ORDER BY R.REVIEW_SEQ DESC

SELECT R.REVIEW_SEQ AS REVIEW_SEQ, R.REVIEW_TITLE AS REVIEW_TITLE, R.REVIEW_CONTENT AS REVIEW_CONTENT, R.RATING AS RATING, R.USER_ID AS USER_ID, U.NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME, R.REG_DT AS REG_DT, RM.ROOM_TITLE AS ROOM_TITLE, RT.ROOM_TYPE_TITLE AS ROOM_TYPE_TITLE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN RESERVATION RS ON R.RSV_SEQ = RS.RSV_SEQ INNER JOIN ROOM_TYPE RT ON RS.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ = RT.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ INNER JOIN ROOM RM ON RT.ROOM_SEQ = RM.ROOM_SEQ INNER JOIN SB_USER U ON R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE R.REVIEW_SEQ = #{reviewSeq} AND R.REVIEW_STAT = 'Y'
SELECT ROOM_TITLE FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_SEQ = #{roomSeq}

SELECT REVIEW_SEQ, RSV_SEQ, USER_ID, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, RATING, REVIEW_STAT, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT, PROF_IMG_EXT, USER_NICKNAME, ROOM_TYPE_SEQ, ROOM_ADDR, ROOM_TITLE, ROOM_TYPE_TITLE, REVIEW_IMG_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.REVIEW_SEQ, A.RSV_SEQ, A.USER_ID, A.REVIEW_TITLE, A.REVIEW_CONTENT, A.RATING, A.REVIEW_STAT, A.REG_DT, A.UPDATE_DT, B.PROF_IMG_EXT, B.NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME, C.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ, D.ROOM_ADDR, D.ROOM_TITLE, E.ROOM_TYPE_TITLE, ( SELECT F.REVIEW_IMG_NAME FROM REVIEW_IMAGE F WHERE F.REVIEW_SEQ = A.REVIEW_SEQ AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS REVIEW_IMG_NAME FROM REVIEW A JOIN SB_USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID JOIN RESERVATION C ON A.RSV_SEQ = C.RSV_SEQ JOIN ROOM_TYPE E ON C.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ = E.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ JOIN ROOM D ON E.ROOM_SEQ = D.ROOM_SEQ WHERE A.REVIEW_STAT = 'Y' ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC ) TMP WHERE ROWNUM <= 13
